image.description: A close-up of a plant leaf with superimposed quantum wave functions
A garden gnome standing next to a Schr√∂dinger's cat box
A watering can pouring out a stream of water molecules and subatomic particles
A confused-looking gardener staring at a quantum entangled pair of tomatoes
A garden shed transforming into a particle accelerator
A flowerpot with the text 'Heisenberg's Uncertainty Principle: You can know where you planted it OR when it will bloom, but not both' overlaid
A quantum computer made entirely out of vegetables and gardening tools
A gardener wearing VR goggles, apparently pruning a virtual probability tree
